DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate renoprotective effect ( i.e . albuminuria- bloodpressure lower effect ) spironolactone 25 mg o.d . type 1 type 2 diabetic patient albuminuria despite recommended antihypertensive treatment .
DOC.criteria: Diabetes Mellitus Diabetic Nephropathy Glomerular filtration rate > 30 ml/min/1.73 m2 Blood pressure > 130/80 mm Hg Child bear potential Plasmapotassium > 4.5 mmol/l Breastfeeding Abuse alcohol drug Nondiabetic kidney disease
